title: [Silver and Emerald]
description: Immense trees and tall, gaunt houses crowd the cobbles, hovering in like suspicious sentinels guarding the road.  Wood-slatted gates bar entry to steps which lead up to the dwellings.

Immense trees and tall, gaunt houses crowd the cobbles, hovering in like suspicious sentinels guarding the road.  Wood-slatted gates bar entry to steps which lead up to the dwellings, their shadows falling faintly into the street.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
